snippet.title: Clock Out at 2: Modern Horror Visual Novel Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Celia, an Afro-Latina woman, who is trying to survive another day at work. You need to clock out early but the company culture won't allow it. To make matters worse, ever since the “incident” and you’ve been seeing strange and terrifying creatures.

Is it real? Or is the stress getting to you?

Make it to the end of the day while balancing your mental health or face being sent to HR.

-Projected features with subject to change:
24 possible endings
60 CGs
Over 50k+ words
Voice acting
An original soundtrack
& MORE!

Even though the game is still in development, you can play the demo here:
https://bt-games-mac.itch.io/clock-out-at-2

#clockoutat2 #horrorstories #visualnovel
